full_title: Uncle Tom's cabin, or, Life among the lowly
pagination: xiv numbered pages, 325 numbered pages, 13 unnumbered pages, 8 unnumbered leaves of plates :
title: Uncle Tom's cabin, or, Life among the lowly
notes:
Fiction.

In publisher's royal blue cloth binding, gilt in silver and gold.

Advertisements on p. [2-13] at end.

Ruth-Ann M. Harris; gift; 201102.

Burns Library copy: various manuscript annotations and autoraphs: on front pastedown: St. Hilda's S.S. Church S.S. No. - 79; at fore-edge head of recto front free endpaper: Mrs. H. Hartley, 114 Windemere Ave., Toronto, Canada.
by_statement: by Harriet Beecher Stowe ; with a sketch of the life of the Reverend Josiah Henson, generally known as "Uncle Tom."
